articles.headline: Bitcoin, Ethereum, and XRP Crash Triggering $637M in Liquidations
articles.description: A weekend crypto crash triggered $524M in liquidations, with fears over Tether's stability and DAT selling pressure acting as key catalysts.

articles.headline: Ethereum’s Privacy Upgrade Hides Transaction Details Like a Secret Santa Game
articles.description: Distributed Lab researchers have published a breakthrough protocol demonstrating how Ethereum can implement privacy-preserving games while maintaining participant confidentiality and correctness.The ZK Secret Santa (ZKSS) system uses zero-knowledge proofs to establish gift sender-receiver relationships without revealing identities, addressing fundamental challenges in executing private transactions on public blockchains.The timing proves significant ...

articles.headline: ETH News: Ethereum Developers Prep for Fusaka, Second Upgrade of 2025
articles.description: The goal of the upgrade is to enable Ethereum to handle the large transaction throughput from the layer-2 chains that use the blockchain as their base layer.

articles.headline: Tom Lee's Ethereum DAT BitMine now holds 3% of the total ETH supply
Tom Lee Says Ethereum Firms Are ‘Elite Of Wall Street’ — Is His Bullish $9000 Prediction Possible?
bitcoin price ethereum price: Bitcoin and Ethereum Fall Sharply as Crypto Sell-off Resumes
articles.description: The current downturn in cryptocurrencies commenced once more on Monday, causing Bitcoin and Ethereum to experience steep declines, according to CNBC. This market movement coincides with a wider risk-off mood at the start of the new month. Ben Emons, founder and Chief Investment Officer of Fedwatch Advisors, stated that a massive $400 million exchange liquidation has generally been blamed for Monday's reversal. Experts warn that "There is still a lot of leverage in Bitcoin out there" due to the asset class's decentralized and opaque nature, which is leading to continued crypto sell-off pressure.

articles.headline: Global financial crash warning: Why Robert Kiyosaki urges buying Bitcoin (BTC USD), Ethereum (ETH), gold &
articles.description: Biggest market crash warning: Bestselling author Robert Kiyosaki warns investors of an imminent global financial crisis and urges them to invest in Bitcoin, Ethereum, gold, and silver before the market crash intensifies. Learn why he believes these assets are crucial for wealth protection.
